TopicTitle: Bug with vanishing fuel upon loading

Articles.Content:
Just did my first Mun landing and managed to touch down successfully. But I had a bug with my fuel, in exact order (relevant) this happened:

  1. I noticed the bottom right indicator showing my dv at 0 even though I had about half my fuel left (the fuel bars were showing correctly) and the engines worked correctly as landing
  2. I saved the game on the ground
  3. To test what's up with the dv I re-engaged the engines (worked) and spent accellerated to about 500 m/s (my dv remained at zero, the fuel bars were slowly going down as expected)
  4. I reloaded the game
  5. Now both my dv and the fuel gauges were at zero and I was unable to use the engines again, stranding me on the moon

Please fix.

Edited February 25, 2023 by MarcAbaddon
Had the same thing, but on minmus
